snippet: “He believed the dog was immortal. ‘There will always be a Rin Tin Tin,’ Lee Duncan said, time and time again, to reporters, to visitors, to fan magazines, to neighbors, to family, to friends.”
lead_paragraph: “He believed the dog was immortal. ‘There will always be a Rin Tin Tin,’ Lee Duncan said, time and time again, to reporters, to visitors, to fan magazines, to neighbors, to family, to friends.”
